title: Patch 5.23 issues
body: so after i updated my client to the latest patch after pressing launch the log in screen would not load up i waited a hour and nothing ive reinstalled still nothing{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey im a teemo,

This is likely the result of a connection issue. Can you try disabling your firewall and see if it loads afterwards?
no firewall active would windows defender be making it happen tho

Any updates? You may want to try the solutions in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article!
